info.intro: Scoutradioz is an FRC scouting app developed by The Gearheads which enables teams and organizations to **gather their own, customized intel at competitions**.

features.intro: Initially created in 2018, Scoutradioz has continued to evolve and it now runs on Amazon Web Services. Here is a list of some of the features Scoutradioz offers:
features.modular: **Modular and configurable** pit & match scouting surveys, so your organization can pick exactly what info you want to record and show
features.management: Event management tools such as auditing match assignments, swapping scouters in and out, and managing a list of members
features.free: And of course, it's completely free!
